title: FC Colombier
text:
FC Colombier are a <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> team from <a href="Colombier%2C%20Neuch%C3%A2tel">Colombier</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a> who are currently playing in the 2L Inter Group 1 2009–10.
FC Colombier's traditional <a href="Kit%20%28association%20football%29">kit</a> colours are red-and-white shirts, with shorts and white socks.
